marklogic.body:
Well, this one gets double points on my "Most Depressing Story" list. It might top the Dad-Punches-Little-League Coach story. Still, it doesn't quite Reach the Mom-Murders-Cheerleader-to-Give-Daughter-a-Spot-on-the-Squad story.
A common denominator: This has nothing - nothing - to do with loving children. It is all about the parents: competitive, greedy, insecure adults who want the best house on the block, the biggest TV screen and, by gawd, children with the most Easter Eggs.
